meanings.definition: A liquid or lotion applied to the skin after shaving to soothe and moisturize.
meanings.sent1: After shaving, he applied aftershave to his face to make it feel better.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new bottle of aftershave to use after shaving her legs.
meanings.sent3: The aftershave smelled so good that he wanted to use it as cologne.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a splash of aftershave, refreshing and invigorating.
meanings.sent5: The aftershave worked like magic, calming his skin instantly.

meanings.definition: The act of applying aftershave to the face.
meanings.sent1: His aftershave application was quick and precise, leaving his skin smooth.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the ritual of aftershave application after every shave.
meanings.sent3: The aftershave application turned into a playful game with his reflection.
meanings.sent4: Her aftershave application was like a gentle caress on her skin.
meanings.sent5: The aftershave application felt like a refreshing breeze on his face.

meanings.definition: Aftershave products typically contain alcohol and fragrance.
meanings.sent1: The store had a variety of aftershave products with different scents.
meanings.sent2: He preferred aftershave products that were alcohol-free for sensitive skin.
meanings.sent3: The aftershave products on sale caught her eye with their colorful packaging.
meanings.sent4: The scent of his aftershave products lingered in the bathroom for hours.
meanings.sent5: She enjoyed exploring new aftershave products to find her favorite scent.
